source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_00<tab>Mogule is waiting all by himself for the Twelveswood moogles.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_00<tab>モグモグホーム付近のモグールは、森のモーグリたちの到着を待ち詫びているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_01<tab>Wait as Mogule might, the moogles from the Twelveswood are nowhere to be seen. He is sure that his directions to meet at the floating island among the sea of clouds were perfectly clear. However, it seems he underestimated the vastness of the landmasses above the skies, and also the clarity of his own directions, and after conferring with you realizes it may be possible the Twelveswood moogles wrongly traveled to the Sea of Clouds. Since <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> has to stay behind at Moghome should the Twelveswood moogles eventually show up, Mogule bids you go to the Sea of Clouds to look for the missing moogles. Travel to Camp Cloudtop and ask its inhabitants if they know aught of a band of moogles amongst their midst.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_01<tab>ドラヴァニア雲海に招待した森のモーグリたちが、いつまで経っても現れないという。誤って「アバラシア雲海」に向かった可能性がある。アバラシア雲海のキャンプ・クラウドトップで森のモーグリ族の情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_02<tab>After questioning the inhabitants of Camp Cloudtop, you find out that not many besides you have ever actually seen a moogle in the flesh. However, one of the knights tells you of a man named Gildon, who has been going on about “kupo” related nonsense for the past several days. Seek out Gildon near the Rosehouse and see if he has any information that may guide you in your search.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_02<tab>キャンプ・クラウドトップで情報を集めた。その中に、モーグリ族の声らしきものを聞いた男性がいるという情報があった。アバラシア雲海のローズハウスにいる「ギルドン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_03<tab>Gildon, grateful that someone is actually taking his rants seriously, says that he heard moogle voices near Ok' Zundu. Ask the Vanu Vanu of that tribe if they have seen anything of the fabled creatures.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_03<tab>ギルドンは、アバラシア雲海のオク・ズンド付近に向かうモーグリ族の声を聞いたようだ。アバラシア雲海のオク・ズンドで森のモーグリ族の情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_04<tab>After questioning the Vanu Vanu of Ok' Zundu, you learn little of use besides knowledge of the creatures and clouds in the area. However, one of the giant birdlike creatures tells you that a Vanu Vanu by the name of Guna Vanu has said something about whispers flitting amongst the clouds. Speak to Guna Vanu to find out what he knows.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_04<tab>オク・ズンド付近で情報を集めた。グナバヌというバヌバヌ族が、モーグリ族の声らしきものを聞いたようだ。オク・ズンドの「グナバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_05<tab>Upon speaking with Guna Vanu, you find that his brother spoke of hearing unfamiliar voices from under a bridge not far from Ok' Zundu. Could these be the errant moogles? Or a troll? Seek out the bridge to find out.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_05<tab>橋の下から、モーグリの声が聞こえたという者がいるようだ。オク・ズントのはずれにある橋の下で、森のモーグリ族を探そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_06<tab>You search under the bridge and find a lost Kupli Kuki from the Twelveswood. Apparently the Twelveswood moogles misinterpreted the letter, as Mogule guessed, and came to the Sea of Clouds─an understandable mistake. Luckily, thanks to your diligent search, the Twelveswood moogles can now proceed on their way to Moghome for plenty of fun mingling.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_SEQ_06<tab>迷子になっていた森のモーグリ族、クプリ・クキを見つけた。やはり、「ドラヴァニア雲海」と間違えて「アバラシア雲海」に来ていたらしい。クプリ・クキは、空のモーグリ族と会えなかった理由がわかって、ひとまず安心したようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_00<tab>Inquire about the moogles at Camp Cloudtop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・クラウドトップで情報を集める

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Gildon at the Rosehouse.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_01<tab>ローズハウスのギルドンと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_02<tab>Inquire about the moogles at Ok' Zundu.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_02<tab>オク・ズンドで情報を集める

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_04<tab>Search for moogles under the bridge outside Ok' Zundu.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_TODO_04<tab>オク・ズンドのはずれの橋の下で森のモーグリ族を探す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_000<tab>I feel like I've been flapping my wings forever, and still the Twelveswood moogles are nowhere in sight. I told them I'd be waiting for them on a floating island above the clouds. Those directions are perfectly clear, aren't they?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_000<tab>招待した森のモーグリたちが、いつまでたっても来ないくぽ。
ちゃんと、雲海の浮島で待ってるって伝えたはずくぽ……。
まさかここ以外に、「雲海」って呼ばれる場所があるくぽ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_001<tab>...You mean there are <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> floating islands to the east!? Why didn't you say so earlier? The Twelveswood moogles could be there right now, all alone, kupo...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_001<tab>……「あばらばら雲海」くぽ！？
別の場所にも雲海があるなんて、知らなかったくぽ！
もしかして、そっちに行っちゃってるかもしれないくぽ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_002<tab>I can't be expected to know of <var 1A 02 /var>every<var 1A 01 /var> island... Well, we can't <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> go look for them─what if they show up here? Adventurer, you're friends with the Twelveswood moogles─go in search for them, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_002<tab>その、あば……なんとかの場所をモグは知らないくぽ。
ふたりで行って、入れ違いになっても困るし……
「あぶらぶら雲海」で、森のモーグリたちを探してほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_013<tab>How many islands could there possibly <var 1A 02 /var>be<var 1A 01 /var> in the sky... Adventurer, please go look for them to the east, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_MOGULE_000_013<tab>その、あば……なんとかの場所をモグは知らないくぽ。
あば……あぶら……「あぶらばら雲海」……で、
森のモーグリたちを探してほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_HARMIETTE_000_010<tab>...Moogles? As much as I'd like to help you, I've never seen one of those in all my days. The only excitement I've had the luck to deal with is the dwindling wine stores. I swear those barrels must come to us half-drunk already...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_HARMIETTE_000_010<tab>……モーグリ族なんて、生まれてこの方、見たことがないわ。
最近変わったことといえば、ワインの備蓄が減ってたことぐらい。
モーグリ族とは、まず関係ないでしょうね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_FABRELLET_000_011<tab>...Now why in the seven hells would a moogle be <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var>? Well...now that you mention it, Gildon was going on about kupo-something or other. He might know something that can help you, if you can stand his rambling. You can find him in the Rosehouse.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_FABRELLET_000_011<tab>……モーグリ族なんて、こんなところにいるわけがないだろ！
いや、でも待てよ……「クポクポ」って幻聴を聞いたやつがいる。
ローズハウスにいる「ギルドン」から、話を聞いてみな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_CARIBAULT_000_012<tab>Can't say I've seen a moogle around here. Of course, even if I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> see one, how the hells would I know what I was looking at?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_CARIBAULT_000_012<tab>……モーグリ族って、どんな姿をしてるんだ？
見たことないし、たぶん見てもわからないんじゃないかな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_HARMIETTE_000_021<tab>Someone's been getting into the wine─that stuff doesn't just evaporate into thin air!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_HARMIETTE_000_021<tab>モーグリ族なんて、生まれてこの方、見たことがないわ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_FABRELLET_000_022<tab>He's been talking about hearing strange voices nonstop for the past few days. Being up this high...it <var 1A 02 /var>changes<var 1A 01 /var> some people...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_FABRELLET_000_022<tab>「クポクポ」って幻聴を聞いたやつがいる。
ローズハウスにいる「ギルドン」から、話を聞いてみな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_CARIBAULT_000_023<tab>What does a moogle even look like? I'm not like to find out any time soon...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_CARIBAULT_000_023<tab>モーグリ族って、どんな姿をしてるんだ？
見たことないし、たぶん見てもわからないんじゃないかな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GILDON_000_020<tab>...Did you say moogles? Thank the gods, finally someone who believes me! Like I've been telling everyone, I heard a strange voice saying “kupo, kupo” near Ok' Zundu to the north. I know what I heard, and there isn't anyone who can tell me otherwise!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GILDON_000_020<tab>……おぉ、ついに自分の証言を信じる者が現れたか！
実は「クポクポ」という奇妙な声が、「オク・ズンド」がある、
北の高台に向かい、消えていくのを聞いたのであ～る！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GILDON_000_025<tab>Just go north to Ok' Zundu, and you'll hear “kupo” drifting through the winds if you listen carefully. Trust me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GILDON_000_025<tab>実は「クポクポ」という奇妙な声が、「オク・ズンド」がある、
北の高台に向かい、消えていくのを聞いたのであ～る！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GANUVALI_000_030<tab>Ah, netherling seeks white fluff which flies like gaelicat? Ganu Vali looks to sky and sees only...clouds! Clouds speak only in thunder and wind, Ganu Vali hears not this “kupo.”
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GANUVALI_000_030<tab>……これは、これは、白いふわふわした生き物を探してる？
たしかに、白い雲みたいな塊が、空にたくさん浮いてるよ！
でも、でも、たぶんそれは……本物の雲よ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_AANUVANU_000_031<tab>Netherling speaks of moogles? Aanu Vanu knows not of such flying animals, Sea of Clouds home to only gaelicats, sanuwa, and meddlesome insects!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_AANUVANU_000_031<tab>どうした、どうした？
モーグリ族……それは虫のような生き物か？
はて、そのような虫は聞いたこともないぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUNUVALI_000_032<tab>Netherling seeks animal which flies like soaring cloud? Kunu Vali only sees clouds in skies, but Guna Vanu says something of strange whispers brought by distant breeze. Ask him what they might mean, netherling should.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUNUVALI_000_032<tab>……なんと、なんと、綿雲のような生き物を見たかとな？
ふむ……確か「グナバヌ」が何か言っておったな。
やつに聞いてみるのが、良いだろうね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GANUVALI_000_042<tab>White clouds paint sky of Ok' Zundu, but none come to surface and speak!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GANUVALI_000_042<tab>たしかに、白い雲みたいな塊が、空にたくさん浮いてるよ！
でも、でも、たぶんそれは……本物の雲よ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_AANUVANU_000_043<tab>Sea of Clouds home to swarms of gaelicats, endymions, and sanuwa, but moogles Aanu Vanu sees not.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_AANUVANU_000_043<tab>モーグリ族？
それは、それは、虫のような生き物か？
はて、そのような虫は聞いたこともないぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUNUVALI_000_044<tab>Guna Vanu speaks of clouds which mutter nonsensical words. Ask him, he may know what you seek.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUNUVALI_000_044<tab>ふむ……確か「グナバヌ」が何か言っておったな。
やつに聞いてみるのが、良いだろうね。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GUNAVANU_000_040<tab>Ah, netherling, too many moons pass since last meeting. What do you seek of Guna Vanu?

TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GUNAVANU_000_041<tab>Ah, yes... Not long ago Guna Vanu find brother cowering in shade, speaking of strange voices under bridge. Bridge lies outside Ok' Zundu, maybe netherling find “moogles” there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GUNAVANU_000_041<tab>……なるほど、なるほど、クヌバリさまから話を聞いたのか。
我が弟が「橋の下からクポクポと声がする～！」と怯えていた。
オク・ズンドのはずれの、橋の下を探してはどうか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GUNAVANU_000_052<tab>Guna Vanu's brother incessantly speaks of voices under bridge...maybe “moogles” you seek lie there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_GUNAVANU_000_052<tab>我が弟が「橋の下からクポクポと声がする～！」と怯えていたぞ。
オク・ズンドのはずれの、橋の下を探してはどうか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUPLIKUKI_000_050<tab>Oh! Were you looking for me, kupo? Thank the heavens someone found me! You see, I was looking for moogles in the sky...but there are so many mean-looking monsters, kupo! Under this bridge was the safest place...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUPLIKUKI_000_050<tab>……わわっ、モグのことを探していたクポ？
それは助かったクポ……お空のモーグリを探して、
あちこち飛び回ったけれど、見つからなくて困ってたクポ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUPLIKUKI_000_051<tab>You mean, Moghome is all the way on the other side of the sky!? What a waste of an airship trip... Well, with you to guide us, at least we know where to go next, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ908_01973_KUPLIKUKI_000_051<tab>……呼ばれたのは、この「あばらばら雲海」じゃなかったクポ！？
せっかく飛空艇に乗ってやって来たのに損したクポ。
とりあえず、勘違いとわかって、ひと安心クポ～♪
